Events.Event_Name: HCTUptakeAtDebut: state 0 (decision, sigmoid by year and sex)
HCTUptakePostDebut: state 1 (decision, piecewise by year and sex, annual rate)
HCTTestingLoop: state 2 (random choice: ART staging or LTFU)
HCTTestingLoop: state 3 (random choice: delay to next HCT test or LTFU)
TestingOnSymptomatic: state 1 (random choice: ART staging or LTFU)
TestingOnANC: state 3 (random choice: LTFU or ART staging)
TestingOnChild6w: state 0 (random choice: LTFU or ART staging)
TestingOnChild6w: state 1 (random choice: LTFU or ART staging)
ARTStaging: state 2 (check eligibility for ART, CD4 agnostic)
ARTStaging: state 3 (random choice: delay to staging by CD4 or LTFU)
ARTStaging: state 4 (random choice: delay to staging by CD4 or LTFU)
ARTStaging: state 5 (check eligibility for ART by CD4)
OnPreART: state 1 (random choice: pre-ART or LTFU)
OnPreART: state 3 (check eligibility for ART by CD4)
OnPreART: state 4 (random choice: begin branch to enroll in ART or return to pre-ART)
